mapper.insert: INSERT INTO selseat( selseat_no , rez_no, grade, section, col, num, status, pretime ) VALUES(seq_selseat_no.nextval, #{rezNo}, #{grade},#{section} , #{col}, #{num}, 2, sysdate )
mapper.select: select selseat_no selseatNo, grade, section, col, num from selseat s, reserve r where r.rez_no = #{rezNo} and r.rez_no = s.rez_no
select grade, section, col, num from selseat s, reserve r where s.rez_no = r.rez_no and prod_no = #{prodNo} and viewDate = #{viewDate} and s.status != 0

select s.rez_no rezNo, grade, section, col, num, r.prod_no prodNo, p.hall_no hallNo, to_char(viewDate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') viewDate, prodName, to_char(showTime, 'hh24:mi') showTime from selseat s, reserve r, product p where s.rez_no = r.rez_no and r.prod_no = p.prod_no and selseat_no = #{selseatNo}
select count(*) from reserve r, selseat s where r.rez_no = s.rez_no and r.prod_no = #{prodNo} and r.viewDate = #{viewDate} and s.section = #{section} and s.status = 1
